newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - WorldCom as strong buy. [CORRECTED 23:55 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - WorldCom as strong buy. [CORRECTED 23:55 GMT]

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said analyst Jack Grubman reinitiated WorldCom Inc with a strong buy rating.

-- said the combination of WorldCom and MFS Communications Corp "creates what amounts to a global alliance...and is the strongest combination of strategic position, growth potential, and management in the global telecommunications industry."
-- estimated earnings of $0.37 per share for 1997, and $0.85 (corrects from $0.845) for 1998.
